message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to let it go for $100.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less. I'm willing to pay $75 for it. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $90. It's a great price, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway Alice, but I'm still hoping to get it for a bit lower. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. This is my final offer.

I understand you're being firm with your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll give you a deal at $92, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice, but I'm sticking with my previous offer of $85. It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident it's a good deal.

I understand you're sticking to your guns, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll give you a deal at $88, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting.
